Summary: Fast moving, low altitude, silent ball of white light flying from west to east.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around June 11th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was having a bonfire with my girlfriend when she pointed on the ball of light. It was fast, passing by us in about a minute. Coming from the west and heading east. It was also pretty low to the ground, approximately 500-1000 ft. high. It was completely silent, both my girlfriend and I could not make out a sound. I couldn't make the shape of the object out because it was extremely bright. It seemed to be a white light without any flashing. That's what I orginally thought was odd, but the lack of any sound is far stranger. Since most of the planes and helicopters I do see pass by are very loud. It moved in a straight line and I lost sight of it once it passed behind some trees. At first I thought it was a helicopter because a medical helicopter passed going in the same direction an hour earlier. Though I recall how loud the helicopter was. Then I thought maybe it was a blimp because its race weekend. But it was moving much too fast for any blimp I've ever seen.
